thread.title: Bulbs.com to offer Sengled's new LED Smart Home Products
thread.title_full: Bulbs.com to offer Sengled's new LED Smart Home Products

author: admin
title: Bulbs.com to offer Sengled's new LED Smart Home Products
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/8/2015 @ 6:15 AM Companies mentioned in this article: bulbs.com 
WORCESTER, Mass., Sept. 8, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Bulbs.com , one of the largest online distributors of commercial lighting products, will add a full line of Sengled smart home LED products that integrate practical consumer electronics with energy efficient LED light bulbs. 
http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20131021/NE00845LOGO 
"Sengled has achieved a very unique combination of consumer electronics and smart lighting that is changing how consumers think about light bulbs," says Mike Connors CEO of Bulbs.com. Bulbs.com will start selling a full line of innovative smart home products manufactured by Sengled to further expand its assortment of connected home products. The Sengled line-up includes: Pulse, Pulse Solo, and Boost -- Sengled Pulse is a smart bulb that combines the energy efficiency of a dimmable LED light with the high-quality audio of a 13-watt JBL Bluetooth speaker. Simply twist Pulse into any standard light socket and adjust both lighting and sound from the free iOS/Android app. Comes as a starter pack with one master and one satellite bulb, with the ability to connect up with eight bulbs via Bluetooth for surround sound. -- Sengled Pulse Solo works similarly to Pulse but functions independently, without any additional satellites. You can still enjoy the energy efficiency of a dimmable LED light combined with the high-quality audio of a JBL Bluetooth speaker, and adjust both lighting and sound from the Sengled app on an iOS or Android device. Perfect for desk lamps in bedrooms or offices. -- Sengled Boost gives you Wi-Fi where you want it, combined with high-efficiency, dimmable LED light. End Internet dead zones for good as each bulb you connect increases the range of your Wi-Fi. Perfect for back offices, basements or outside patios. Chosen as 2015 CES Innovation Awards Honoree in the Smart Home category. 
"We are excited to work with Bulbs.com and leverage their knowledge of the commercial lighting market. Their passion for lighting combined with online marketing strength and sales skills make them an ideal partner for Sengled's growing portfolio of smart home products. As Sengled reinvents the light bulb into hybrid consumer electronics devices, Bulbs.com's focus on educating consumers and providing post-sale support is key to greater smart lighting adoption," says Alex Ruan, General Manager of Sengled USA. 
Visit Bulbs.com to learn more about Sengled or call a certified Lighting Specialist at 888-455-2800. 
About Sengled 
Sengled is a global innovator in LED lighting, pioneering research and development that brings bright new ideas to smart lighting, by integrating consumer electronics with energy-saving LED Bulbs. Sengled provides consumers with app controlled, intuitive, eco-friendly products that bring smart home capabilities to every room, enhancing the connected home with technology for entertainment, utility and security. Tour Sengled's connected home at www.sengled.com . 
About Bulbs.com 
Bulbs.com, headquartered in Worcester, Mass., is a leading online lighting supplier. Established in August 1999, Bulbs.com provides lighting products to over 150,000 commercial customers operating across 300,000 locations in the hospitality, retail, property-management, healthcare, manufacturing, education, and municipal sectors. For more information, visit Bulbs.com. 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/bulbscom-to-offer-sengleds-new-led-smart-home-products-300138519.html 
SOURCE Bulbs.com
